alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 5:55AM CST until December 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Less than an inch of additional accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing visibilities from 1/2 mile to 1 mile. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will reduce the visibility, mainly in open country within the Red River Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Steele
